name: JTR Challenge Environment (Ubuntu)
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y git build-essential libssl-dev pkg-config python3 python3-pip libbz2-dev && sudo git clone https://github.com/openwall/john -b bleeding-jumbo /opt/john && cd /opt/john/src && sudo ./configure && sudo make -s clean && sudo make -sj4 && sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /opt/john && echo 'export PATH=/opt/john/run:$PATH' >> /home/vscode/.bashrc
